name: Space Gangster 2
description:
*Space themed car thief game.
*Rich 3D graphics and realistic physics.
*New models of destroyable vehicles.
*Wide selection of new weapons!
*Large map to explore.

Sequel of sensational game with millions of downloads!

Get the control of the orbital station and save the galaxy!
Fight through endless enemies and use all your weapon arsenal to succeed.
Play a role of a gangster on an immense fields of space station.
Extreme hard battles, spaceship flights, futuristic vehicles and much more.
Join the whole world of greed and headhunt in a future.
